document_data.name: Duskrose
document_data.mainbody: '''Duskrose'''<ref group="note">Not to be confused with the [[common]] term for [[Common dictionary|a woman who enjoyed pain]]. was a prominent non-noble family who served the Crown of [[Cormyr]] up to the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2014)/Ship Graveyards}}
document_data.History: The Duskroses were long-time servants of the Crown in the [[Castle Obarskyr|Royal Palace]] and [[Royal Court]], alongside the [[Bracetel]]s, [[Lionwinter]]s, [[Ormantrel]]s, [[Saraclarr]]s, and [[Windstone]]s. Additionally, several members of the family were knighted in the 12{{th}} and 13{{th}} centuries DR.
